# Familiar Double (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Shadow Spells|shadow]])

**Level:** [[7th Level Witch Spells|Witch 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small replica of you worth 5 gp)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** One shadow duplicate

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 181

This spell functions as *[[Project Image (Spell)|project image]]*, except the image appears in your familiarâ€™s square and moves when your familiar moves.
